participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and dedicated, Emily finds joy in her artistic pursuits and balances her responsibilities as a single parent.
participant_1.background: I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends. My cupcake business keeps me busy, but I also enjoy hiking and biking in my new home state of Florida. my mother was born in ireland. I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life. I am raising my kids on my own.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and family-oriented, Ryan values connection and strives to share his experiences with his loved ones.
participant_2.background: I've kept my college debt a secret from my parents. My family is important to me, and I like to share stories about them with my children. I work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager. School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies. I work as a bartender.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for work?
I'm a bartender at a small restaurant. I work long hours, but I like it.
I'm glad you enjoy your job! I'm a potter and I also work as a cupcake baker. I'm raising my kids on my own, so I have to keep busy!
Wow, that's a lot of work! I admire your determination. I'm also a big fan of cupcakes. Do you have any pictures of your work?
Sure, I'd be happy to share them. Here's a link to my Instagram: [link]
Wow, those are beautiful! I love the colors and designs.
Thanks! I'm glad you like them.
What's your favorite part about being a potter?
I love the process of creating something from clay. It's so satisfying to see your work come to life.
That makes sense. I can see how that would be really rewarding.
It is. I'm also really proud of the work that I do.
I'm sure you should be. It looks amazing.
No problem! I'm really enjoying our conversation. It's nice to talk to someone who shares my interests.
Me too! I'm always happy to meet new people who appreciate art.
Me too! I think it's important to support the arts.
I agree. They're an important part of our culture.
